```{r}
# Load Required Packages
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(kableExtra)
library(knitr)
library(ggplot2)

```

Clean the Data
```{r}
# Read in Data
snowshoe_df <- read_csv("showshoe_lter.csv")
snowshoe_df

# Select Sex, Weight, Hindfoot Ratio, and Grid 
# Filter Information from Grid "bonmat", as Adequate Mtadata for the Site is Unavailable
# Remove Rows Containing Questionable Sex
# Convert Grid and Sex Data to Lowercase
# Remove NAs from the Dataframe
snowshoe_clean_df <- snowshoe_df %>% 
  select(grid, sex, weight, hindft) %>% 
  filter(grid != "bonmat",
         sex != "?",
         sex != "M?",
         sex != "F?",
         sex != "m?",
         sex != "f?",
         sex != "pf") %>%
    mutate(grid_l = str_to_lower(grid),
           sex_l = str_to_upper(sex)) %>% 
  select(-grid,
        -sex,
        -grid_l) %>% 
  na.omit()


snowshoe_clean_df
```


Summarize the Data
```{r}
# Summarize the 

# Create a Summary Table of Mean Weight and Hind Foot Ratio for Each Sex
mean_table <- snowshoe_clean_df %>% 
  group_by(sex_l) %>% 
  summarise(mean_wt = round(mean(weight), 2),
            mean_hf = round(mean(hindft), 2))

names(mean_table) <- c("Sex", "Mean Weight (g)", "Hindfoot Ratio") 

mean_table 

summary_table <- kable(mean_table) %>% 
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = "striped", 
                full_width = FALSE) %>% 
  add_header_above(c("", "Average Snowshoe Hare Weight and Hind Foot Ratio in the Bonanza Creek Experimental Forest" = 2))
summary_table
```

Visualize the Data
```{r}
# Create a Graph of the Data
snowshoe_graph <- ggplot(snowshoe_clean_df) +
  geom_point()
                         
```
